title: Absolver
notes: Game runs in offline mode, can't play online due to EAC. At one point, EAC worked in lutris's patched fortnite build of wine. Framerate also seems worse with Proton.

title: Absolver
notes: Game starts, you can change settings in menu but you can't continue your game because it crashes while loading.
